testCases.label: Verify equal_to compares equality correctly
testCases.description: Checks that equal_to returns True when values are equal and False otherwise.

testCases.label: Verify greater_than compares values correctly
testCases.description: Ensures greater_than returns True when the first value is greater than the second.

testCases.label: Verify less_than compares values correctly
testCases.description: Ensures less_than returns True when the first value is less than the second.

testCases.label: Verify greater_than_or_equal_to handles equality and greater values
testCases.description: Checks that greater_than_or_equal_to returns True when values are equal or the first is greater.

testCases.label: Verify less_than_or_equal_to handles equality and lesser values
testCases.description: Ensures less_than_or_equal_to returns True when values are equal or the first is smaller.

testCases.label: Verify not_equal_to identifies unequal values
testCases.description: Checks that not_equal_to returns True when values differ and False when they are equal.

testCases.label: Verify logical_and performs boolean AND
testCases.description: Ensures logical_and returns True only if both inputs are True.

testCases.label: Verify logical_or performs boolean OR
testCases.description: Checks that logical_or returns True when at least one input is True.

testCases.label: Verify logical_not performs boolean negation
testCases.description: Ensures logical_not returns the opposite boolean value.
